text: Kayyar Kinhanna Rai () (8 June 1915 - 8 August 2015) was an Indian independence activist, author, poet and a journalist. He used to work with Gandhi when peacefully fighting for India's independence. Kai died from pneumonia at a hospital in Badiyadka, Kasaragod, Kerala at the age of 100.ಕಾಸರಗೋಡಿನ ಕನ್ನಡದ ಗಟ್ಟಿದನಿ ಕಯ್ಯಾರ ಕಿಞ್ಞಣ್ಣ ರೈ ಅಸ್ತಂಗತ ==References== Category:1915 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Indian activists Category:Indian centenarians Category:Indian writers Category:Indian journalists
title: Kayyar Kinhanna Rai
